alert.note: Alert for Baca; Bent; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 9:01PM MDT until August 05 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... North central Baca County in southeastern Colorado... East central Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1000 PM MDT. * At 901 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles northwest of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 22 miles southwest of Lamar, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Two Buttes Reservoir and Two Buttes. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
